title: Executive Order 5717-Modification of Public Water Reserve No. 116, California
content: The Executive order of May 16, 1928, creating Public Water Reserve No. 116, is hereby modified to the extent of authorizing the Federal Power Commission to issue a license for Project No. 1123 on the following-described lands:
T. 1 N., R. 1 W., sec. 14, SW. ¼ SW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5717-Modification of Public Water Reserve No. 116, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361295
